column1: Art Institute of Chicago////What??! forget the MOMA! hands down this is the best museum I've been to in a really long time...usually you go to museums and you're just kind of like "hhm yeah... I guess this is interesting" and zombie yourself through a labyrinth. But not here
column2: every room has something unexpected. I knew the minute I found myself Â face to face with Edward Hopper's Nighthawks (which til then I had only had posters of) that this was going to be a memorable experience! And that it was...
